abstract: The billionaire Carl C. Icahn said Thursday that he has sued Dell Inc., seeking to prevent the company and its board from altering terms of a scheduled vote on a proposed $24.4 billion takeover bid by the computer maker’s founder.
snippet: The billionaire Carl C. Icahn said Thursday that he has sued Dell Inc., seeking to prevent the company and its board from altering terms of a scheduled vote on a proposed $24.4 billion takeover bid by the computer maker’s founder.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire Carl C. Icahn said Thursday that he had sued Dell Inc., seeking to prevent the company and its board from altering terms of a scheduled vote on a proposed $24.4 billion takeover bid by the computer maker’s founder.

headline.main: Icahn Sues Dell to Halt Changes to Buyout Vote

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
